fields.body:
Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},

{% with content_object.user.get_profile.commitments_made_last_24_hours as commitments %} We can tell you’re really dedicated to making your community cleaner! You recently
committed to complete some actions. Your commitments were:

    {% for uap in commitments %}
  • {{ uap.action }} by {{ uap.date_committed|date }}
    • {% endfor %}
{% endwith %} {% with content_object.user.get_profile.commitments_made_more_than_24_hours as commitments %} {% if commitments %} Remember, you've also committed to complete some other actions:
    {% for uap in commitments %}
  • {{ uap.action }} by {{ uap.date_committed|date }}
    • {% endfor %}
{% endif %} {% endwith %}

{% with content_object.user.get_profile.number_of_committed_actions as num_commitments %}

The annual energy savings from completing {{ num_commitments|pluralize:"this action is,these actions are" }} equivalent to
diverting {{ content_object.user.get_profile.potential_points }} pounds of coal from a power plant.

You can start saving energy right away by completing {{ num_commitments|pluralize:"this action,these actions" }}. If you get stuck,
try reviewing the action page or asking a question in the action comments. Other users will be happy to help!

{% endwith %}

Keep up the good work!

Cheers,
The Repower at Home Team
fields.name: Day after you make a commitment
fields.subject: Your latest Repower at Home commitment

fields.body:
Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},

The due date for your commitment is approaching! By {{ content_object.date_committed|date }}
you committed to:

    {% for uap in content_object.user.get_profile.commitments_due_in_a_week %}
  • {{ uap.action }}
    • {% endfor %}

We can’t wait to add your impact to our goal of saving the equivalent of one million
pounds of coal by October 10th. Let us know when you’re finished by following the link
above and marking the action as done.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home Team
fields.name: 1 week before commitment due
fields.subject: Your Repower at Home commitments are due soon!

fields.body:
Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},

You committed to complete the following actions by today:

    {% for uap in content_object.user.get_profile.commitments_due_today %}
  • {{ uap.action }}
    • {% endfor %}

It's time to report on your progress. Follow the link above and click the “I did this!”
link on the action page. If you need more time, you can also update your commitment
from the action page.

Cheers,
Repower at Home
fields.name: Day before commitment is due
fields.subject: DUE TODAY: Your Repower at Home commitments

fields.body:
Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},

You committed to complete the following actions by today:

    {% for uap in content_object.user.get_profile.commitments_due_today %}
  • {{ uap.action }}
    • {% endfor %}

It's time to report on your progress. Follow the link above and click the “I did this!”
link on the action page. If you need more time, you can also update your commitment
from the action page.

Cheers,
Repower at Home
fields.name: Commitment is due tomorrow, don't let us down
fields.subject: Don’t let us down! Your energy commitment is due today

fields.subject: Time is running out on your energy commitment
